items.text: Good morning Yokosuka! ☀️ The weather forecast for today, January 2nd, predicts a cloudy sky with a chance of rain or snow in the evening, accompanied by thunder. Meanwhile, don't miss the winter illumination event at [**insert URL to Yokosuka Countdown 2026 here**, if available], happening from December 31st to January 1st! #Yokosuka

today.weather_text_ja: くもり　所により　夕方　から　雨か雪　で　雷を伴う
